name: GMKR
description:
GMKR is a free RPG game maker for Android or Windows, featuring an easy map editor with talking characters, items to collect, weapons, keys and doors to unlock, enemies and companions with IA, musics, events...

Share your creations with your friends, or publish them on the wall of public maps.

Play and win the rpg maps built by others to gain points and enter the leaderboard!
